title: Send Ctrl+Alt+Delete to VNC
author: neokiller
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
I don't seem to be able to send ctrl+alt+delete to the VNC client , so I am wondering if I the options could be provided to send it in.

iterations.description: The issue title mentions sending Ctrl+Alt+Delete to VNC but the body is empty and the only comment asks for clarification on what exactly isn't working, with no response from the reporter

comments.author: Benchwork
comments.snippet:
when you say your not able to send ctrl+alt+delete to the VNC client, are you saying that you are right-clicking your active tab > send special keys > Ctrl+Alt+Delete  and nothing is happening?  or that your looking for a way to send the special keys?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7304823/27134048-5545fb16-50e2-11e7-9906-7ead95621729.png)

Peter.

notes:
AI triage: The issue title mentions sending Ctrl+Alt+Delete to VNC but the body is empty and the only comment asks for clarification on what exactly isn't working, with no response from the reporter
Approach: If confirmed, add Ctrl+Alt+Delete to the VNC special keys menu handler, sending the appropriate key sequence via the VNC protocol library
